name: plugHR
tag_list: hiring, induction, policy-design, organization-design, compensation-planning, performance-management, employee-engagement, leadership-development
overview:
India’s first subscription based HR department, plugHR offers true plug-n-play options for entrepreneurs to set up professional HR function as per their need. Quick, scalable & fully flexible, plugHR subscriptions allow organizations to bring in standard knowledge, sharp execution and superior intervention, all in a simple engagement.

plugHR delivery comes in a combination of online & offline connect.Enterprises gets to access the Knowledge Frameworks(pH8) hosted on the cloud along with an onsite team at their site to execute the end to end HR Operations
